journey.title: Our Journey
journey.description: From humble beginnings to becoming Amsterdam's most trusted cleaning service

team.subtitle: OUR PROFESSIONAL TEAM
team.title: Meet the Cleaning Experts
team.description: Our experienced professionals are dedicated to providing exceptional cleaning services

brand.title: Trusted by Premium Brands
brand.description: We proudly serve restaurants, cafes, and commercial establishments with exceptional cleaning standards

aboutServices.title: ABOUT OUR SERVICES
aboutServices.question: Is Your Home's Clutter Stealing Your Peace of Mind and Precious Family Time?
aboutServices.description1: Remember that sigh of relief from a sparkling home? When was the last time you felt that? Are you constantly battling endless chores, feeling like your to-do list never shrinks? How much quality time are you losing with loved ones, simply trying to keep up?
aboutServices.description2: Reclaim Your Space. Reclaim Your Life. With OMG Cleaning Company.
aboutServices.buttonText: Get Your Free Quote & Your Free Time!

companyArea.subtitle: ABOUT OUR SERVICES
companyArea.title: Is Your Office's Mess Silently Costing You More Than You Realize?
companyArea.description1: Imagine walking in, not inspired, but weighed down by dust, sticky surfaces, or neglected restrooms. How much productivity is lost when your team is distracted? Are you truly comfortable with clients seeing anything less than pristine?
companyArea.description2: Reclaim Your Workspace. Elevate Your Image. Experience the OMG Difference.

teamSection.subtitle: THE TEAM
teamSection.title: Our Leaders
teamSection.description: Our clients are the companies and startups who make the world go round!

2009.title: Company Founded
2009.description: Started with a small team dedicated to providing exceptional cleaning services in Amsterdam.

2012.title: Commercial Expansion
2012.description: Expanded services to include office buildings and commercial spaces across the Netherlands.

2015.title: Eco-Friendly Initiative
2015.description: Launched our green cleaning program using only environmentally safe products and methods.

2018.title: Technology Integration
2018.description: Implemented digital booking systems and real-time tracking for enhanced customer experience.

2021.title: Industry Recognition
2021.description: Awarded "Best Cleaning Service" in Amsterdam for three consecutive years running.

2022a.title: Team Expansion
2022a.description: Grew our professional cleaning team to over 100 certified staff members.

2022b.title: COVID-19 Safety Protocol
2022b.description: Implemented enhanced sanitization procedures and safety protocols for all services.

2023a.title: Mobile App Launch
2023a.description: Released our customer mobile app for easy booking and service management.

2023b.title: Sustainability Certification
2023b.description: Achieved ISO 14001 environmental certification for our green cleaning practices.

present.title: Market Leadership
present.description: Proudly serving 2,500+ satisfied customers across 50+ cities in the Netherlands.

testimonials.title: Don't Just Take Our Word For It...
testimonials.intro: Imagine the relief our clients felt.

testimonial1.quote: Wow, wow, wow! Thanks! You really left our place without a speck. And you saved us from losing our deposit! You're by far the best! The next time I need a cleaning service, you'll be the first I call!
testimonial1.author: - Mindy M., Amsterdam, NL

testimonial2.quote: Without a doubt, our team are fantastic. They are punctual, friendly, very detailed in cleaning, and organized. If you're looking for prompt and reliable house cleaning service, choose this one.
testimonial2.author: - Brenda A., Amsterdam, NL

cta.title: Try our cleaning service now!
cta.description: Everything you need for professional cleaning services that keep your space spotless and sanitized.
cta.experienceProfessionalCleaning: Experience Professional Cleaning. Keep Your Space Spotless and Healthy.
